text: Maria Eugénia Pinto do Amaral (April 1, 1927, Lisbon - August 25, 2016, Lisbon) was a Portuguese actress and singer.PÚBLICO: Maria Eugénia Pinto do Amaral, accessdate: August 27, 2016 She became known as the Radio Girl when she starred in the movie of the same name directed by Arthur Duarte in 1944. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Portuguese movie actors Category:Portuguese television actors Category:Portuguese voice actors Category:Portuguese stage actors Category:Portuguese singers Category:Actors from Lisbon
title: Maria Eugénia
